name: Cyber Betty // Modern Sleipnir
description: My interpretation of Cyber Sleipnir based on American Gods by Neil Gaiman. Odin's faithful companion on every journey. What would happen if he ended up in my Cyber World? This is what I imagined when I thought about it. What would you choose? Classic Betty or Cyber Sleipnir with 6 Wheels? Your choice is important for the future of my cyber world.
